author: からかい上手の高木さん
text:
我是一位台灣人，非常喜愛日本的一切，包括許多的vtube，但之前的一中事件，雖然我知道是因為你們的公司都是從中國拿取資金，而且中國的高層也給你們的公司施壓，所以你們才發佈了一中原則...
但是我還是得退訂你們所有有關於hololive的所有vtube了，希望你們能夠重視自己所發出的「一中原則」的正確性
我並不認為台灣是中國的一部分，也不認為台灣是「中華民國」，台灣就是一個獨立的國家，不屬於任何人的。
很抱歉我在底下的留言討論到了政治，但我希望hololive能好好處理好此事件了

author: からかい上手の高木さん
text:
我最近仔細思考了一下，我發覺我可能用錯方法來表達抗議了，所以我在此留言底下將鄭重的對日本hololive公司及旗下的vtube道歉。
我之前可能因為一時的氣憤，而將矛頭指向了錯誤的人，所以我在此對hololive及旗下的所有vtube道歉，也對因我們台灣而被懲罰的vtube們感到抱歉，所以我將不會繼續在底下打擾hololive旗下的vtube了，也不會在底下繼續跟中國人起紛爭了，也對其他深深喜愛著hololive和喜愛著日本vtube的人們道歉，許多日本人可能看了這篇中文文章也不知道我在表達什麼，所以我想在底下說一句：

申し訳無い、おわ詫びもう申しあ上げます.

希望日本人們別因為我一時的衝動言論，而對台灣有不好的印象。

author: valrossenOliver
text:
​ @ピカタンタ  
Well, yes... but just like the word kiss means piss in Swedish and something else in English I am pretty sure the swastika means something VERY different in the Asian nations. Saw many on shrines when I was in Japan.

author: ピカタンタ
text: @valrossenOliver  it has always been called swastika from Sanskrit language svástika,in Buddhism it symbolizes the auspicious footprints of the Buddha. so what I mean is it IS the swastika just not the tilted one

author: Nexcell Pride
text:
Greatest streaming ever, but Rushia-hime would be proud to winning more than losing at Toy Boxing... :_るんるん::_ちょうちょ:
Possibly she was starting to despair when the user "Rocky" was winning more matches in a row.
That caused Rushia's tantrum during the ending before Supacha Yomi Time, precisely at 1:08:15, when she started to cry. 
But at starting the Supacha Yomi Time, surprisingly Rushia calms down as nothing happened, but the tantrum and crying at ending the mic was on. (Personally I can't blame her, since she emotionally breaks down so easily) 

Additionally, the user "Rocky" send Superchat message and also a rematch until Rushia wins... Obviously during Supacha Yomi Time. (I never watched "Supacha Yomi Time" being Interrupted by another gameplay. Possibly before June 2020 Rushia wanted more during "Supaachaato Orei Time", sadly I started to following Rushia at mid May 2020 and videos until starting June 2020 are private, except for 1st stream and 3D debut stream) 

But well :_きゅん: Problem solved... And a happy ending after Supacha Yomi Time, ending and the after-end:_ハート:
